org.mcm.sws.util
Class Config

java.lang.Object
  org.mcm.sws.util.Config
public class Config
extends java.lang.Object

The WSPlan configuration class. This class reads the config.xml (or similar) file, which contains links to WSDL documents, SESMA Annotations, ontologies, fact bases and goal descriptions. This class is used and needed by all applications in the WSPlan toolset.

Author:
Joachim Peer
